overview_of_class: his seminar course explores Iberian and Latin American cultural and political issues in relation to particular representational techniques, prominent literary traditions, subject-and national-making practices, and varied forms of writing literary texts. Topics vary.
name: Practicum in Scholarly Writing & Publication
title: WCAS SPANPORT 495-0-20 Practicum in Scholarly Writing & Publication
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Please contact the department of Spanish & Portuguese to request a permission number, spanish-portuguese@northwestern.edu.
